page.title: Volume Object Kinematics Properties Pane
page.introduction: When a Spatial Objects is selected, Object Properties are displayed for that Object. The Volume Object Kinematics Properties Pane is used to display and enable those properties that will be used to describe the surface's kinematic process.
page.operations:
Use the check box to enable properties that will be used to describe the kinematics for the selected object. The available properties are:
Volume Centroid to specify the centroid x and y position. (the current solver is limited to 2D) This property is currently not available to use.
Interior Velocity to specify the x and y velocity components.
Volume Regions Size to specify the size (area in 2D) of the volume object
